name: Responsive Design Practical Example & Guide - Pinterest Clone Part 5
description:
This is a step by step guide to how I made the Pinterest landing page design responsive.


You'll also find the wireframe, components, and design of the Pinterest landing page.


Each step has its own frame, with highlights and instructions.


A link to a YT video where I go through the steps will be added here and to file, Soon!


Also, this design is responsive for desktop and should also work on tablet devices.
